name: The Cave (itch) (Gabe, Toreole, FishLabs)
description:
This "game" was supposed to be an entry for this game jam :
https://itch.io/jam/devsquadjam5
But because the jam was announced so sudden, we didn't had enough time to submit it so we decided to finish it and publish it as a sort of small demo, so here it is.
Controls are simple, move Left or Right with A/D or Left Arrow/Right Arrow, your task is to find the end of the cave, if you can find it, of course.

Programmer (me) : Gabe https://gabexd.itch.io

Level designer : Toreole https://toreole.itch.io

Character artist : FishLabs https://floppyfish.itch.io

Tile assets and music were used from https://opengameart.org/
https://opengameart.org/content/old-city-theme
